name: Acquisition War
description:
How to play

As the CEO of a multinational holding company, your task is to find the most valuable markets in the world and control them. The board of directors allocates a certain amount of initial capital to you at the beginning of each level. You will use the initial capital and your headquarters to acquire the company on the map, suppress competitors, and finally acquire the headquarters of the competitors to win.

Five different types of industries

Finance, technology, loans, energy, real estate, financial industry can get Acquisition Premium, technology industry can generate technology points, loan industry can obtain additional loan income, real estate industry can reduce its own acquisition premium, and energy industry has higher income. In order to monopolize the industry and obtain monopoly profits, it is necessary to purchase, upgrade, merge and expand in different industries.

Matthew Effect

The bigger your market share is, the more revenue you have, but the market share has a square relationship with income. For example, when your market share is two times that of your opponent, your income will be four times that of your opponent. So you need to expand quickly and squeeze your opponent, or you may have serious losses.

R & D of science and technology

Through the control of technology companies to carry out scientific and technological research and development to obtain an unequal competitive advantage, rapid victory.

Headquarters acquisition

When you buy all the headquarters of an opponent, it means that you will take over all the companies he owns, and obtain the purchase amount, remaining capital and technology points of his headquarters.

Various levels

The game has 50 + various levels, the passed levels will be collected, and you can play the collected levels again, and the level of the collected level will be improved to contribute more profits to the holding company

If you encounter stuck or flashback problems, please update your graphics driver to the latest.
